title: varai illAmal
sahitya:
varai illAmal aruLai vAri vazhangiDuvAn tirai kaDark-karaiyOram uraivOn aDiyArkku


anupallavi

  kurai tam adai eDuttu kUrit-tannai aDuttu tiruccendUr vandu darishittiDuvOrkku


caraNam    aDuttaDuttu OyAdu alai pAivadaip-pOl aDuttaDuttu OyAdu aDi tozha varuvOrkku
koDaikkaram OyAdu koDuttiDa sOrAdOn paDai vIDugaL Aru paDaittiTTa pErALan
